de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.services

Class ServerPackService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.services.ServerPackService

  • @Service
public class ServerPackService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class revolving around with server packs, like downloading, retrieving, deleting, voting etc.

    • Method Detail

      • findByProjectIDAndFileID

        public java.util.Optional<ServerPack> findByProjectIDAndFileID(int projectID,
                                                               int fileID)
        Find a specific server pack by searching with a CurseForge project and file ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Integer. The CurseForge project ID.
        fileID - Integer. The CurseForge project file ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the server pack for the passed project and file ID wrapped in an Optional. I recommend to make use of Optional.isPresent() and Optional.get().

      • deleteByProjectIDAndFileID

        protected void deleteByProjectIDAndFileID(int projectID,
                                          int fileID)
        Delete a server pack with a given CurseForge project and file ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Integer. The CurseForge project ID.
        fileID - Integer. The CurseForge file ID.

      • findByFileID

        public java.util.Optional<ServerPack> findByFileID(int fileID)
        Find a server pack by its database id.
        Parameters:
        fileID - Integer. The database id with which to search for a server pack.
        Returns:
        Returns a server pack for the passed database id wrapped in an Optional. I recommend to make use of Optional.isPresent() and Optional.get().

      • downloadServerPackById

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> downloadServerPackById(int id)
        Download a server pack with the given database id.
        Parameters:
        id - Integer. The database id of the server pack to download.
        Returns:
        Returns a response entity with either the server pack as a downloadable file, or a response entity with a not found body.

      • voteForServerPack

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> voteForServerPack(java.lang.String voting)
        Either upvote or downvote a given server pack.
        Parameters:
        voting - String. The database id of the server pack and whether it should be up- or downvoted.
        Returns:
        Returns ok if the vote went through, bad request if the passed vote was malformed, or not found if the server pack could not be found.

      • getServerPacks

        public java.util.List<ServerPack> getServerPacks()
        Get a list of all available server packs.
        Returns:
        List ServerPack. Returns a list of all available server packs.

      • getServerPacksByProjectID

        public java.util.List<ServerPack> getServerPacksByProjectID(int projectID)
        Get a list of all server packs using a CurseForge project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Integer. The CurseForge project ID with which to search for server pack.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all server packs for the passed CurseForge project ID wrapped in an Optional. I recommend to make use of Optional.isPresent() and Optional.get().

      • insert

        protected void insert(ServerPack serverPack)
        Store a server pack in the database.
        Parameters:
        serverPack - Instance of ServerPack to store in the database.

      • updateServerPackByID

        protected void updateServerPackByID(int id,
                                    ServerPack serverPack)
        Update a server pack database entry with the given database id.
        Parameters:
        id - Integer. The database id of the server pack to update.
        serverPack - Instance of ServerPack with which to update the entry in the database.

      • updateDownloadCounter

        protected void updateDownloadCounter(int id)
        Increment the download counter for a given server pack entry in the database identified by the database id.
        Parameters:
        id - Integer. The database id of the server pack.

      • updateConfirmedCounter

        protected void updateConfirmedCounter(int id,
                                      int vote)
        Either increment or decrement the confirmed working value of a given server pack entry in the database, identified by the database id.
        Parameters:
        id - Integer. The database id of the server pack.
        vote - Integer. Positive for upvote, negative for downvote

      • updateServerPackByProjectIDAndFileID

        protected void updateServerPackByProjectIDAndFileID(int projectID,
                                                    int fileID,
                                                    ServerPack serverPack)
        Update a server pack entry in the database identified by a CurseForge project and file ID combination, using a passed server pack.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The CurseForge project ID.
        fileID - The CurseForge file ID.
        serverPack - The server pack with which to update the entry in the database.

      • deleteServerPack

        protected void deleteServerPack(int id)
        Deletes a server pack with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - Integer. The database id of the server pack to delete.
